response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary offering comes with unparalleled features and capabilities that promise to revolutionize the way you operate. Given its exceptional quality and unique benefits, we believe it's worth more than $800,000 to us. However, considering the value it can bring to you, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a limited-time offer, and we encourage you to seize this chance to experience the full potential of our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your hands.", "product_price": 750000}
